analysis.description:
Hype.fallback (/unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol#163-187) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- level[step_pay].send(bonus) == true (/unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol#177-180)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.Take_share_team_AES (/unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol#235-239):
	External calls:
	- AEStoken.transfer(multisig,500000) (/unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol#237)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- share_team_AES (/unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol#237-239)

Crowdsale.Take_share_team_AES (/unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol#235-239) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-AEStoken.transfer(multisig,500000) (/unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol#237)

Crowdsale.createTokens (/unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol#255-295) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-AEStoken.transfer(msg.sender,Tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol)

Hype.fallback has external calls inside a loop:
	- level[step_pay].send(bonus) == true (/unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol#177-180)

Crowdsale.Time_Start_Crowdsale should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol#230-234)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol#57)
Hype.price should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol#156-158)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol#82) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_toaddress' of BasicToken.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol#72) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of BasicToken.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol#72) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_address' of Freeze_contract.Freeze (/unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol#99) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_uint' of Freeze_contract.Freeze (/unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol#100-101) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_address' of Freeze_contract.pay_Bounty (/unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol#118) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_sum_pay' of Freeze_contract.pay_Bounty (/unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol#118) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_address' of Freeze_contract.offFreeze_Bounty (/unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol#123-124) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_addres' of Hype.Hype (/unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol#154) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_addres' of BigHype.BigHype (/unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol#191) is not in mixedCase
Hype.percent_hype (/unique_contracts/0x9f06b7263a24c48f284c3e25c28dfd63cea24ac6.sol#160) is never used in Hype
